steps.title: Draw an elongated oval.
steps.content: Draw an elongated oval. Draw a line bisecting the oval.

steps.title: Sketch in details, like the thickness of the middle line and the vane as well.
steps.content: Sketch in details, like the thickness of the middle line and the vane as well.

steps.title: Outline your feather and erase guidelines.
steps.content: Outline your feather and erase guidelines.

steps.title: Draw an elongated oval tilted to the right.
steps.content: Draw an elongated oval tilted to the right. Draw a middle diagonal line from the tip of the oval to the base and extending a little outside the oval.

steps.title: Draw feathery strokes or edgings to the oblong.
steps.content: Draw feathery strokes or edgings to the oblong.

steps.title: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.
